name: UOverlaySlot
doc: Slot for the UOverlay panel.  Allows content to be hover above other content.

Padding: The padding area between the slot and the content it contains.
HorizontalAlignment: The alignment of the object horizontally.
VerticalAlignment: The alignment of the object vertically.

methods.name: SetHorizontalAlignment
methods.doc: Set the alignment of the object horizontally.

methods.name: SetPadding
methods.doc: Set padding area between the slot and the content it contains.

methods.name: SetVerticalAlignment
methods.doc: Set the alignment of the object vertically.
